arch.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a structure with a curved top and straight sides that supports the weight of a bridge or building
arch.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a curved structure above a door, window etc
arch.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: a curved structure of bones in the middle of your foot
arch.translation[0].definitions[3].defin: something with a curved top and straight sides
arch.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to form or make something form a curved shape
arch.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: Two rows of trees arched over the driveway.
arch.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: amused because you think you understand something better than other people
arch.translation[2].definitions[0].examp: ‘I think he’s in for a surprise, ’ Ian said, in a somewhat arch tone.
arch.translation[3].definitions[0].defin: belonging to the highest class or rank
